term.title: quantum counter

item.text: A medium emitting with a quantum yield independent of the excitation energy over a defined spectral range (e.g, concentrated rhodamine 6G solutions between 300 and 600 nm). Also used for devices producing an electrical signal proportional to the photon flux absorbed in a medium.
